sentences.en: That debtor in a sales contract is the Seller.
sentences.cn: 在销售合同中，此债务人为卖方。

sentences.en: Private spending in the debtor nations fell sharply.
sentences.cn: 债务国家的私人开支剧烈下降。

sentences.en: All four of the debtor countries in the chart enjoyed housing booms.
sentences.cn: 在图表中的四个债务国都享受了房地产繁荣。
